scripts.dev-all:windows: concurrently "npm run dev-admin" "npm run dev-user" "npm run dev-socket-srv"
scripts.dev-all:unix: concurrently "npm run dev-admin" "npm run dev-user" "npm run dev-socket-srv"
scripts.dev-all: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run dev-all:windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npm run dev-all:unix', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.build-all: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run build-all:windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npm run build-all:unix', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
